content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting various machines

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at position(-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Connected by burner inserters

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at position(-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Connected by burner inserters

### Automation Science Pack Production Line
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(5.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at position(8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at position(11.5, 13.5)
- Stone furnace at position(14.0, 14.0)
- Connected by burner inserters and belt groups
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for material handling

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position(41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at position(41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles in occupied spaces
- Check if the target location is clear before attempting to place electric poles
- Ensure there are no existing entities at coordinates before placement

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Verify that the target chest contains the desired items before attempting extraction
- Check chest inventory contents before attempting to extract items
- Consider implementing better inventory tracking to avoid attempting extraction of non-existent items

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor and maintain proper supply chains for production processes
- Keep track of ingredient requirements and maintain adequate stock levels

### Power-related issues
- Maintain adequate fuel supply in boilers
- Monitor power consumption and generation to prevent production stoppages
- Ensure proper connection of electrical networks to all machines requiring power
